mean_cn: v.估价，估计；  n.估价，估计
mean_en: a judgement that you make without having the exact details or figures about the size, amount, cost, etc. of something; a statement of how much a piece of work will probably cost
sentence: The worker estimates the cost of the repairs.
sentence_trans: 这个工人估算了一下维修的花费。
word_etyma: estim估计 + ate动词后缀 → estimate估计
